brief.en_US: EasyDoc is a document parsing service developed by EasyLink AI, powered by its proprietary vision-language model. Designed for developers, EasyDoc offers accurate and efficient processing of unstructured documents across various formats (e.g., PDF, images, Word). It outputs structured data to empower the creation of intelligent and high-performance AI Agent applications across industries such as finance, legal, healthcare, and enterprise automation.
brief.ja_JP: EasyDoc は、EasyLink AI によって開発されたドキュメント解析サービスであり、独自のビジョン・ランゲージモデルを搭載しています。開発者向けに設計されており、PDF、画像、Word などのさまざまな形式の非構造化ドキュメントを正確かつ効率的に処理します。構造化データを出力することで、金融、法務、医療、企業自動化などの分野における高度でインテリジェントな AI エージェントアプリケーションの構築を支援します。
brief.pt_BR: O EasyDoc é um serviço de análise de documentos desenvolvido pela EasyLink AI, alimentado por seu modelo proprietário de visão e linguagem. Projetado para desenvolvedores, o EasyDoc oferece processamento preciso e eficiente de documentos não estruturados em vários formatos (por exemplo, PDF, imagens, Word). Ele gera dados estruturados para viabilizar a criação de aplicações de Agentes de IA inteligentes e de alto desempenho em setores como financeiro, jurídico, saúde e automação empresarial.
brief.zh_Hans: EasyDoc 是由 EasyLink AI 开发的文档解析服务，基于其自主研发的视觉语言模型。它专为开发者设计，能够高效、准确地处理各种格式的非结构化文档（如 PDF、图像、Word）。EasyDoc 输出结构化数据，助力金融、法律、医疗、企业自动化等行业构建智能、高性能的 AI Agent 应用。

brief.en_US: The Chuangsi LLM Safety Toolkit is a comprehensive content security solution designed for large language models (LLMs). It is engineered to detect and mitigate potential safety risks in both model inputs and outputs, including politically sensitive content, explicit material, illegal or non-compliant information, harmful value orientation, abusive language, and privacy violations. For high-risk queries, the toolkit also supports secure and trustworthy response generation, empowering users to build LLM systems that are both safe and compliant.
brief.zh_Hans: 创思大模型安全工具是一款面向大语言模型的内容安全防护系统，旨在识别和拦截LLM输入与输出中的潜在安全风险，包括涉政敏感、色情、违法违规行为、负面价值导向、辱骂言论及隐私泄露等内容。针对存在风险的输入，该工具还支持安全可信代答，助力用户实现大模型系统的安全合规。

Through two main functional modules, trading calendar derivation and trading calendar list, it efficiently retrieves key time nodes such as the previous and next N trading days, first and last trading days of the week/month/year, and complete trading day lists within specified periods, meeting the time series analysis needs in various financial scenarios.
brief.zh_Hans: 整合了A股市场交易日历相关的核心数据能力，为金融分析、量化交易、投资策略制定等场景提供精准的时间维度支持。通过交易日历衍生和交易日历列表两大功能模块，可高效获取前后N个交易日、周/月/年首尾交易日等关键时间节点，以及指定周期内的完整交易日列表，满足各类金融场景下的时间序列分析需求。
